name: ECCC Foundation
goal:
ECCC Foundation's mission is to promote the concept of the knowledge society and disseminate key competences. Through its initiatives, it encourages entities to develop the information society. It coordinates and supervises activities related to the ECCC digital competence certification standard based on EC's DigComp frames.
ECCC Foundation promotes education, acquiring knowledge and supports initiatives aimed at developing competences.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives: ECCC Foundation is observing policies and initiatives which support the digital skills development and digital competence validation and its role in employability in EU as the Digital Single Market, Digital Agenda for Europe, Education and Training 2020 (ET2020), DigComp.
